column1: crow-sizna 160986947173 "2017-05-23 15:28:01 GMT" https://crow-sizna.tumblr.com/post/160986947173/help-me-pay-for-my-meds-and-rent "angelicdeancas: Hello. Six months ago I asked you to help me because my parents kicked me out after they found out I‚Äôve fallen in love with a girl. I was working in their place and I lost that job too. My boyfriend at that moment told everyone I know about this and spread some lies. He took my dog and a lot of my stuff. He stalked me. He found my tumblr as well and I had to make a new account. I live in my friend house but it was really small so I slept on the floor in the pantry for the last five months.  Now I live in a tiny tiny room and have half time job as a waitress.¬† Two months ago I finally went to psychiatrist and I was diagnosed with severe depression and obsessive-compulsive disorder. It was a lot to finally have someone to talk to about everything.The problem is that I don‚Äôt have the money for all of these meds she prescripted me. I already take asthma medications for couple of years and others for my sensitive stomach. The meds from psychiatrist are quite expensive because I had to choose private payd visit instead of free because they told me I had to wait four months for it. And I can‚Äôt wait that long. I have suicide thoughts and I‚Äôm afraid what I could do. And I‚Äôm still waiting for the therapy. These are my meds now   And the proof of how much they cost    I can‚Äôt really afford for all of them right now.¬†And I really need to use them because I already feel a little better and I don‚Äôt want to be depressed anymore. And I don‚Äôt really have money for even food. I mostly eat only twice a day. I hope this is enough proof for people who are attacking me saying that I‚Äôm lying. I‚Äôm from Poland and here if you go to the private doctor you need to pay 100% for the meds even with the insurance. And the rest of them is still expensive even with 10 or 30% being cheaper. Also we don‚Äôt have any coupons for meds and any apps. You have that in America
column2: that‚Äôs great. But we don‚Äôt. And this month my doctor added some new meds for my asthma (i had spirometry test and it came out pretty bad)¬†and because of that right now I don‚Äôt have anough money to pay my rent.  I talked with my landorld who is a sweet older lady and she is so wonderful that she let me be a little late with my rent. So I have time to the end of the month. I‚Äôve made new posts and least five times because every time the post hits 1k notes people are starting to ignore it
column3: thinking I already have thousand of dollars. Well I don‚Äôt
column4: because people are just mostly reblogging it. I know some people are annoyed by my friend asking everyone to reblog my post. She only wants to help me
column5: because we know each other from childhood and now she is far away from me and can‚Äôt really help me. Please don‚Äôt be mean to her. She is an angel.And you are also annoying with me (if the messages about me just killing myself because i‚Äôm dirty lazy fagot tells anything) but please bear with me for few more days. I‚Äôm trying
column6: I really am but it‚Äôs hard when you are all alone. So if you could spare few dollars please send them via paypal My email: ¬†anne.du@mail.com You can choose any currency you want. Thank you for any help! And please reblog this post. " False text
